Today in County Sligo, Strandhill is working with a swell of 3 ft @ 11s NW and fresh 13 mph E winds, offering some fun conditions. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @ 9s NW with light 6 mph ENE winds, making it less exciting. The day after continues the trend with similar 2 ft @ 6s NNE conditions, keeping it pretty mellow. Best: today.
